CustomField.description: Indicates that the utility, need, or logic of the method remains poorly understood, even after validation. When marked "As Is", we are not approving or disapproving of the logic, just letting it be. As more of the system is refactored, these methods may obtain clearer direction.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The method cannot be validated or deprecated, for now, and is just left as is. This may change when more of the system is refactored.
CustomField.label: As Is
